6#include <iostream>
7
8#include <libdecklink/device.hpp>
9#include <libdecklink/types.hpp>
10
11#include "handle_errors.hpp"
12
13using std::to_string;
14using namespace DeckLink;
15
16void show_help() {
17 std:: cout << "deckmonitor [--list | device-name]\n"
18 << "\n"
19 << "Show the status change notifications of the specified BlackMagic DeckLink video capture card in real time.\n"
20 << " \n"
21 << "USAGE:\n"
22 << " --list, -l List all the detected DeckLink devices\n";
23
24}
25
26void on_status_changed(StatusID status_id, uint64_t param2) {
27 std::cout << " - " << to_string(status_id) << " changed, is now " << param2 << "\n";
28}
29
30int main(int argc, char** argv) {
31 if (argc != 2) {
32 show_help();
33 return -1;
34 }
35
36 std::string device_name{argv[1]};
37 if ((device_name == "--list") or (device_name == "-l")) {
38 const auto devices = Device::List();
39
40 std::cout << "Listing detected devices:\n";
41 for (const auto& device: devices) {
42 std::cout << " - " << device.get_display_name()
43 << " ( " << device.get_vendor_name()
44 << " " << device.get_model_name() << " )\n";
45 }
46 return 0;
47 }
48
49 try {
50 auto has_device = Device::Get(device_name);
51 if (!has_device) {
52 std::cerr << "Error: Unable to locate device named: " << device_name << ".\n";
53 return -1;
54 }
55
56 auto& device = *has_device;
57
58 // NotificationCallback notification_cb(on_status_changed);
59 NotificationCallback notification_cb;
60 notification_cb.set_on_status_changed_cb(on_status_changed);
61 device.set_notifications_callback(std::move(notification_cb));
62
63 std::cout << "Press <ENTER> to exit.\n";
64 std::cout << "Monitoring " << device.get_long_name() << " for status changes .. \n";
65 std::getchar();
66
67 } catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error &ex) {
68 print_driver_error_details(ex);
69
70 } catch (const DeckLink::runtime_error &ex) {
71 std::cout << "\n"
72 << "An error occurred! \n"
73 << boost::diagnostic_information(ex) << "\n";
74 }
75
76
77 return 0;
78}
